I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => (clientId * nat)%type : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments key {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
good_trace : forall K : Type, list (IR K) -> Prop
log_to_IR = fix log_to_IR (env_o : key -> option output) (log : list entry) {struct log} : list (IR key) := match log with | [] => [] | {| eClient := client; eId := id |} :: log' => match env_o (client, id) with | Some _ => [IRI (client, id); IRO (client, id)] | None => [IRI (client, id); IRU (client, id)] end ++ log_to_IR env_o log' end : (key -> option output) -> list entry -> list (IR key) Arguments log_to_IR _%function_scope _%list_scope
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
exported_nil : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output), exported env_i env_o [] []
exported_IU : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)
exported_IO : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)
exported_sind : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (P : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) ->...-> P l l0
exported_ind : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (P : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) ->...-> P l l0
Inductive exported (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> Prop := exported_nil : exported env_i env_o [] [] | exported_IO : forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr ->...-> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr) Arguments exported (_ _)%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments exported_nil (_ _)%function_scope Arguments exported_IO (_ _)%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments exported_IU (_ _)%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> network -> Prop Arguments applied_implies_input_state {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
applyEntries_spec_ind : applyEntries ?h ?st ?es = (?os, ?st') -> forall P : raft_data -> Prop, (forall (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), P (RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output ?st d) cc)) -> P ?st' where ?es : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface aiii : applied_implies_input_interface copi : causal_order_preserved_interface iboi : input_before_output_interface oci : output_correct_interface ogii : output_greatest_id_interface |- list entry] ?h : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params :...
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> entry -> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
applyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => let (out, d) := handler (eInput e) (stateMachine st) in ([out], RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st (assoc_set clientId_eq_dec (clientCache st) (eClient e) (eId e, out))) d) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments applyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface aiii : applied_implies_input_interface copi : causal_order_preserved_interface iboi : input_before_output_interface oci : output_correct_interface ogii : output_greatest_id_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface aiii : applied_implies_input_interface copi : causal_order_preserved_interface iboi : input_before_output_interface oci : output_correct_interface ogii : output_greatest_id_interface |- Type]
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
getLastId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (client : clientId) => assoc clientId_eq_dec (clientCache state) client : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> clientId -> option (nat * output) Arguments getLastId {orig_base_params raft_params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
get_output = fix get_output (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key) {struct tr} : option output := match tr with | [] => None | (_, inl _) :: xs => get_output xs k | (_, inr os) :: xs => match get_output' os k with | Some o => Some o | None => get_output xs k end end : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> key -> option output Arguments get_output _%list_scope
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
Record applied_implies_input_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_implies_input_interface { applied_implies_input : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr } Arguments applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
base_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| data := raft_data; input := raft_input; output := raft_output |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> BaseParams Arguments base_params {orig_base_params raft_params}
get_output' = fix get_output' (os : list raft_output) (k : key) {struct os} : option output := match os with | [] => None | NotLeader _ _ :: xs => get_output' xs k | ClientResponse c id o :: xs => if sumbool_and (c = fst k) (c <> fst k) (id = snd k) (id <> snd k) (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) (Nat.eq_dec id (snd k)) then Some o else get_output' xs k end : list raft_output -> key -> option output Arguments get_output' _%list_scope
step_1_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : OneNodeParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_1 : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> step_relation data (input * output) Arguments step_1_star {P params}

```coq
intros env_o log.
apply exported_ind with (env_i := fun _ => None) (env_o := env_o).
- intros. constructor.
- intros. eapply exported_IU; eauto.
- intros. eapply exported_IO; eauto.
Qed.
